sentences.en: All the people living in that country have auburn hair.
sentences.cn: 住在那个村子里的人们的头发全是赤褐色的.

sentences.en: And as Auburn's largest employer the university also plays a starring role in the local economy.
sentences.cn: 而且作为当地招收工人最多的组织,奥本大学同时也在当地经济中扮演着重要角色.

sentences.en: Auburn Ala. has a population of just under 50000 and is home to Auburn University.
sentences.cn: 奥本拥有人口不超过五万,也是奥本大学的座落地.

sentences.en: Auburn government and its citizens all made great contributions to it.
sentences.cn: 奥本市政厅和奥本市民也都有出色的贡献.

sentences.en: Auburn residents are proud of the development and achievements Auburn has made.
sentences.cn: 奥本市的发展与成就是令奥本市居民最引以为自豪的.
克莱德就要被移解到奥本去.

sentences.en: Her stylishly short auburn hair was streaked naturally with gray.
sentences.cn: 她时髦的金棕色短发里自然地夹着几丝灰发.

sentences.en: In middle age, this Shakespeare has a fresh-faced complexion, a closely trimmed auburn beard, a long straight nose and a full, almost bouffant hairstyle.
sentences.cn: 这个莎士比亚是个中年人，有着精神饱满的脸色、仔细修剪整齐的赤褐色胡子，有一个高爽的鼻梁和几乎全部柔软而又膨松的发型。

sentences.en: Louise has straight, auburn hair and, judging by the only photograph I have of her, she's in her 30s.
sentences.cn: 从我手上唯一一张她的照片可以看出，路易莎一头赤褐色的直发，30岁上下。

sentences.en: Sharon quickly dropped to the floor screaming, Have you seen my boyfriend? He has auburn hair.
sentences.cn: 沙伦跌跌撞撞地过来哭喊到:你见到我的男朋友了 吗 ?褐色头发的.

sentences.en: She also features special eye colors: sky blue, violet, moss green, and auburn.
sentences.cn: 她也拥有特别的瞳色,分别为: 天蓝色, 紫色, 苔绿色和红褐色.

sentences.en: She brushed her hair until it fell in lustrous auburn waves.
sentences.cn: 她把头发梳成了光泽的赤褐色波浪.

sentences.en: She had a mass of auburn hair.
She let her short blonde perm grow shoulder-length and dyed it auburn.
sentences.cn: 她任其金色短烫发长到齐及肩长，而后染成赤褐色。

sentences.en: She pushed her auburn hair back and raised her painted face.
sentences.cn: 她把棕色的头发放到耳后,仰起铺满浓妆的脸.

sentences.en: She shook her mane of auburn hair .
She shook her mane of auburn hair.
sentences.cn: 她甩动她红褐色的长发.

trans.tran_en: auburn hair is a reddish brown colour
